posts.post_content:
"Alright [Kemba, Kha Regent](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kemba, Kha Regent), time to pull this game back from the brink of disaster with your million equipmen-"  
  
\*FLASH\*  
  
Kemba: Sorry man, I got distracted there for a second. What did you want again?  
  
"I wanted your triggered ability to resolve and get me a bunch of cat tokens, please (By Karn's salty \*\*\*, hurry up already).  
  
Kemba: Okay. Done.  
  
"Sweet. Now I can chump block an- Where the f\*ck are the catss?!"  
  
Kemba: There was this really shiny light and it made me drop all my stuff.  
  
"Bloody hell. Well, at least I can chump with you."  
  
Kemba: Nah that light was, lke, really REALLY shiny. Y'know. So shiny I got tapped?  
  
"Dude..."
